title: [GAMEPLAY] GAMEBREAKING ASHE BUG!
body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M0EL5D2Yhx0

Ashe in game is severely bugged.  Players are affected by the frost shot debuff and their auto attacks are replaced by their E skill or another skill like in this video Brand's autos are turned into ULTS at level 1! Please disable Ashe and fix ASAP.

replies.body:
Hey everyone! Wanted to let you know where we landed with this exploit  - and to be clear, this **was** an exploit requiring game manipulation in violation of the Terms of Service, we **are** identifying abusers (fortunately a small number), and we **are** in the process of banning offending accounts.

Regarding the exploit itself, we patched out a server-side fix this morning (no download necessary on your end) and based on initial monitoring, the issue is resolved. Beyond today's fix, we're continuously working every patch to quietly improve our code so problems like this don't hit live servers, though we won't get into specifics for security reasons.

We also wanted to chat about our decision to leave Ashe enabled. As several of you noted, the exploit in question wasn't limited to Ashe, so in handling this particular issue, disabling her would just have led to offending parties sniffing out other abuse cases. Us providing this explanation yesterday would unfortunately have led to the same consequences as well. Withholding information from you is always uncomfortable for us but in situations like this we have to be sure we won't cause more problems for everyone by being up-front.

Thanks for sticking with us on this one, friends.

If you had gold+ mmr from a previous season then you can get in to gold with a 5/5 placement(potentially less).

This affects at least 13 other champions that I know of. It's a bug where you can inject packets to the LoL server and it won't do simple validations like what level you are or whether or not you actually know the skill you're "using". There's a similar problem with summoner spells, which allows you to use spells that no longer exist, and these issues have been off-and-on for years. It's rather surprising that people are getting away with using them, though.. I haven't actually seen them used in real games, but I had an ARAM match tonight where the TF was throwing 2 red cards per AA. I think this calls for disabling at least these champs: Ashe, Brand, Ezreal, Fiora, Gragas, Jax, Lucian, Lulu, Pantheon, Twitch, TF, and Varus.

If there are any other champs, I'm sure there's an up-to-date list on reddit. Riot, you kinda need to worry about this. If all these posts about people having exploited this in 50+ ranked games are true, we may need to roll back the ranked ladder a day or two, or something.
